Outlook, a pilot program run from 2005-08 by Homeland Security and the Department of Defense which used sophisticated military radar along the border north of Spokane, Washington, to catch low-flying drug aircraft. Operation Outlook successfully identified air-related smuggling trends and patterns and organizations active in cross-border criminal activities along the Spokane sector, said a news release from Kirsten Gillibrand 's office.
